attributes.action: Remove Lynn Small from Head Teacher Post at Littleton Green Community School, Huntington, Cannock, Staffordshire
attributes.additional_details:
In view of the recent racial discrimination issue towards a religious outing and the wide spread Media interest.  We express our concern of Lynn Small (Head Teacher) remaining in post.  We want her sacked with immediate effect.

We object to our children as young as 8 being branded as 'RACIST' IF THEY DONT ATTEND ISLAM TRIP. How can anybody in this position send threatening letters to parents!
